title: After Meltdown, Tech-Bottom Signals Have Yet to Scream ‘Buy Now’ - Yahoo Finance
content: After Meltdown, Tech-Bottom Signals Have Yet to Scream ‘Buy Now’  Yahoo Finance
description: (Bloomberg) -- Calling the bottom in the tech-sector meltdown isn’t easy, even after a $5.5 trillion wipe-out, yet there are some signals giving investors hope.Most Read from BloombergWalmart’s Troubles Should Have Everyone on High AlertA $5 Trillion ‘Wealth Shock’ Is Cracking Americans’ Nest EggsHow an Energy Expert Triggered Vladimir Putin With One WordOne of the World’s Frothiest Housing Markets Turned Into a Seller’s Headache OvernightPutin’s War Means Russia’s Rich Aren’t Welcome at Davos A
